2022-02-19.name: Free Entrance Day at Minnesota state parks
2022-02-19.summary: Entrance to all 75 Minnesota state parks and recreation areas is free today.

2022-02-19.name: Maple-syrup festivals
2022-02-19.summary: At nature centers around the region, tour the sugarbush and learn how to tap trees and boil sap. Then, eat a pancake breakfast with real maple syrup.
